name: Mizanur Rahman Mizan
Review: Apple's MacBook Pro 14 M2 Pro is a master of all trades. It's fast, extremely portable, packs an awesome display in a slim profileâ€”and can reach an incredible 24 hours and 12 minutes of battery life, the longest of any laptop we've tested.

name: Abdul Wasay
Review: Dell NoteBook is the best for those who are programming focused and doesn't bother about photoshop apps. This laptop has 500gb SSD in-build, 8GB RAM, Core-i 5, 10Gen. Overall it's good for an average user.

name: Arafat Hossain
Review: Hp Notebook is awesome. One of it' s amazing feature is task management of RAM. You can open many tabs as you want in chrome and can run many apps in background but it runs very very smoothly without slowing down any of your task in app. This is a mid budget laptop.

name: Nabil Kaisar
Review: The Asus Vivobook E210MA Celeron N4020 11.6 inch HD Laptop is a compact and lightweight laptop designed for everyday computing tasks. It is equipped with a reliable Intel Celeron N4020 processor, which provides a balance of performance and power efficiency. With a base clock speed of 1.10 GHz and a maximum turbo frequency of 2.80 GHz, this dual-core processor can handle common tasks such as web browsing, document editing, and multimedia playback with ease. I love this notebook and I will recommmend this to those who are interested in gaming. It's a perfect laptop for them

name: Mainul Islam Sharu
Review: The MSI Modern 15 A5M features AMD Ryzen 7 5700U (Base 1.8GHz up to Up to 4.3GHz) and 8GB DDR4 3200Mhz RAM. The AMD Ryzen 5000 Series Mobile Processor power the next generation of multithreaded tasks and provides lightning-fast responsiveness and efficient battery life (52 Whr) for your passions at works that keep you productive and entertained anytime, anywhere. It has 2 SO-DIMM slots that support up to DDR4-3200 Memory Type and has a 64GB Max Capacity. I will definitely recommend this laptop for professional use

name: Mohiuddin
Review: The Ideapad D330 has computing power and all the fun and mobility of a lightweight tablet. From multitasking to connecting with friends online and streaming shows. This Ideapad D330 featured 4GB DDR4 RAM, 128GB eMMC and Intel UHD 600 Graphics, and Windows 10 Home. The Lenovo Ideapad D330 comes with 10.1 inch (1280 x 800) HD IPS WXGA LED Antiscratch Brightness: 300nits, Aspect Ratio: 16: 10, Color Gamut: 50% NTSC Display. This Lenovo IdeaPad D330 has an abundance of ports, including a USB-C 3.1 to help you charge other devices or transfer data at speeds up to 10 Gbps.
